DataElement.preferredName: Information Booklet Visible Light Avoidance Method Description Given Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not an individual was given information booklet describing necessary light avoidance measures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Information Booklet Visible Light Avoidance Method Description Given
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The condition of being allowed to enter._Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view._Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red)._A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something._An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._A small book, often having a paper cover._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Description; a statement that represents something in words._Transfer possession of something to some person or group.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.:A small book, often having a paper cover.

Concepts.definition: Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.
A small book, often having a paper cover.

Property.preferredName: Visible Light Avoidance Method Description Give
Property.preferredDefinition: Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red).:A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something.:A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Transfer possession of something to some person or group.

Concepts.definition: Electromagnetic radiation in the portion of the spectrum from about 380 nm (violet) to 800 nm (red).
A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
Transfer possession of something to some person or group.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
